Reviews.Title: very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Julio
Reviews.Content: The phone model does not really correspond to the model specified in the title. I bought the model S6102B and get the model  S6102 with defects.

Reviews.Title: Battery does not last past 6 months
Reviews.Author: CT Morton
Reviews.Content: This is the second Dual sim Samsung I have owned. I do not have any issues with the phone and what it does for relatively inexpensive phone. The battery in the first one quit after 8 months...it would charge then be dead within an hour. The second phone was purchased in Oct 12 and yesterday is showing same symptoms as previous battery. It will not even charge.....when plugged into outlet, it says, 'Recharge battery', even though the battery charger is connected. Left plugged in all night....nothing. Replacement phone is $89. 3rd party battery replacement is $27.  Sri, I have had enough....

Reviews.Title: Good phone for Dual SIM function
Reviews.Author: Michael S. Smith
Reviews.Content: While this is not a top of the line phone, it is just what we needed for people who were travelling a lot internationally.  The Dual SIM functionality is perfect for keeping in touch with people without the high roaming fees.Unlike another reviewer, I did receive the "B" version and they arrived on time and in good condition.

Reviews.Title: Dual Sim phone
Reviews.Author: RAC
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because it has dual sim which I could use the phone overseas with both sims attached. What I don't like about this phone is the sound quality you get when listening to MP3s, it doesn't sound as good or even close to an ipod that I am comparing it with.

Reviews.Title: Upgraded
Reviews.Author: G Hinds
Reviews.Content: Good value for price with its dual sim capability and additional SD card slot. The camera takes pretty good pictures

Reviews.Title: It is a good phone.
Reviews.Author: Javier Rebolledo
Reviews.Content: The phone works great, is fast and good reception and battery is lasting. The dual sim works wonderfully. The negative is that it has'n the RAM capacity and although you can fit a memory card of 16 GB can not install many programs.

Reviews.Title: Good entry level phone for the price but not a world phone
Reviews.Author: denbor6
Reviews.Content: The specifications, the features and the ergonomics for the Samsung Galaxy Y Duos S6102 made this an attractive buy, when I was vacationing in the US lst month. The specifications suggested I could also use this in Canada. It worked on an AT&T; SIM. Different story in Canada.Bell Mobility website said "Your device must be compatible - it must be HSPA (or UMTS) and 850 MHz and 1900 MHz compatible" Typical GSM phone specifications. After receiving the phone I entered the IMEI number it came with (Press*#06#) and found that it was not compatible. Did not work on Rogers, Telus and others either. Bell is my telecom service provider, I get 35% off their services as a pensioner. Good incentive right!It would be great if:(1) A specification savvy Amazon shopper, comments on why I messed up on the specs. This dual SIM phone seemed ideal for our minimalist feature needs.(2) I still need an entry level inexpensive smartphone that I can use on Bell Mobility in Canada , while in the USA or when wintering in Thailand, Indonesia, Singapore and Malaysia. As seniors, we need a phone for calling, text, camera and wifi for our safety. Would a supplier for such a phone on Amazon.com recommend a smartphone priced under $125 and include it's IMEI number, so that I do not screw up again.Samsung Galaxy Y Duos S6102 Android Dual SIM Quadband Unlocked

Reviews.Title: I'm very satisfied - This is a Great option !
Reviews.Author: F. Origuen
Reviews.Content: although I regret that this phone did not come with a version of android newest program like the ice cream sandwich 4.0, I consider this phone covers very well the needs of a user requiring connectivity to the web, viewing office documents , PDFs, images and text plus the easy navigation at least makes owning a Samsung phone is a great experience and I liked it so I bought is very economical and very complete.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for international travel
Reviews.Author: Craig LeMoyne
Reviews.Content: Is this the latest Android?  No.  But for the price you cannot beat it...and with dual sim cards, it makes travel a breeze.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Y
Reviews.Author: Nordia
Reviews.Content: The phone is the correct size for my hand, and I love the feel of the phone. The apps are great. The automatic rotation is very sensitive and will rotate on the slightest movement of the phone in the other direction. The only issue I have with the phone is that it every so often you cannot make phone calls from a prepaid plan.  When you make a call the message says there is not enough credit to make the call and there is credit on the phone.

Reviews.Title: Great low budget android
Reviews.Author: JMar
Reviews.Content: My mom needed a new phone as I was annoyed with the piece of crap she had. I bought this and it worked well as she had two sim card with two numbers and didn't want to give up any.A drawback is that you have to manual switch the active line for outbound calls. The previous dual sim phone my mom had gave the option on screen to select the line for the outbound call. It can be a bit annoying and took some effort explaining this to my mom. Also the phone does not seem to autolock after periods of no usage which can be annoying, I have had my mom''s phone call me on multiple occasions without her knowledge.All in all it is a great phone, I mean she now uses Whatsapp and some other applications which I never dreamed she would understand. So great little phone.

Reviews.Title: Nice and sleek
Reviews.Author: Lee
Reviews.Content: I like this product. Very sleek and up to the time. It works well for dual purpose without having bulky bag due to many phones.Good product.

Reviews.Title: Cool dual sim phone
Reviews.Author: William Albert
Reviews.Content: Its internal memory is too small and the android version can't be uploaded. Besides that the rest of the phone rocks!

Reviews.Title: very satisfied
Reviews.Author: Celman
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a double sim card,  android,wifi, GPS this telephone had all the requirements I needed.  Good telephone for a good price, it's worth buying this cell and it was delivered on time.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: belleisha
Reviews.Content: I love it. its what I had expected. That dual sims work well for me that what I needed most.

Reviews.Title: NEVER UPDATE
Reviews.Author: nickalc
Reviews.Content: I updated it and SIM card no long work. I reset it to factory default, still no working. What's weirder, it can't find any update as if it never existes. I can't call or SMS with this s*** now.

Reviews.Title: low memory
Reviews.Author: Douglas Williams "Doug"
Reviews.Content: When i order the phone It was suppose to have a place for a sd card to have more storage.It does have a place for a sd card,but it is all most impossible to move anything to that sd card. I like the phone ok but without external memory it is just a phone.Will most likely not buy another one

Reviews.Title: Nice for dual SIM
Reviews.Author: Dan K.
Reviews.Content: I needed something with dual sim that would also work on WiFi.  I'm very pleased.  The only issue is the on board memory available is a little lacking.  Apps that will not go tothe SD card hog the phone memory.  No way to fix it.

Reviews.Title: Great phone-great price
Reviews.Author: Ros
Reviews.Content: It is all I was looking for. This is my first smart phone... I live in the Dominican Republic, cellphones are very expensive here, specially smart ones. I love it. works fine. Very small, I don't like big phones. To me, it is all it said it woud be. Highly recommend it!

Reviews.Title: amazing phone
Reviews.Author: Cadet
Reviews.Content: with its 2 simcard slots, you don't have to take out your simcard off when you go abroad.you can also use it as hotspot in areas where there is none.its gps app helps you find your direction in location you don't know!

Reviews.Title: It works, but feature wise isn't great.
Reviews.Author: Nicholas J. Seckora "Nick"
Reviews.Content: I want to start by saying I wouldn't buy this phone unless you fully intend to take advantage of having dual sim cards (work and personal number on one phone). I purchased this to use through Straight Talk on the AT&T; network, which it does great. I regret that now as I see Straight Talk now offers phone on Verizon and not the horrible Sprint network, which is why I hated their Android service. It is slow to load and the camera is not auto focus...not a big deal you may think at first, but for banking I would like to deposit my checks using the deposit app, but the phone is blocked from downloading the app because of the lack of autofocus. Other than that the simple games seem to work OK and anything else I've used it for. The signal strength appears to be a bit spiratic and lost one call in little over weeks time. Please do not use the review as an indication of longevity and I have not had it long enough to assess and features.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Simpson Mitchell Bulamu
Reviews.Content: Gr8 Item i hope it will last as long as it it takes the headsets to last as well i love it

Reviews.Title: good stuff
Reviews.Author: Cesar Martinez
Reviews.Content: I think this is a good phone. for my every day use with no problems really. I gotta give to it 5points

Reviews.Title: High Pricing when compared to the features available - for example extremely low memory
Reviews.Author: Harisuthan
Reviews.Content: Bought with a much better expectation - thought will be of a better quality and better features when compared with other phones in the same price range. Was rather disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
Cellular Band - Quad-Band 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900 Mhz
Cellular Band 3G - 850 / 2100 Mhz
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy Y Duos S6102 Black WiFi Android Dual SIM 3G Cell Phone
